verbose_text: In order to determine whether, in immature developing neurons, PKCepsilon mediated restriction of dendritic spine density required PKCepsilon kinase activity, we co-transfected DIV10 cultured hippocampal neurons with plasmids expressing GFP and PKCepsilon-HA or PKCepsilon K437R-HA, a kinase deficient variant bearing a point mutation in the PKCepsilon active site.
evidence: PKCepsilon-mediated restriction of dendritic spine density required PKCepsilon kinase
